| Overview                = The '''Kyriotites''',  '''Dominions''',{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}} or '''Order of Dominions''',{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 21}} are (in [[Christianity]]'s hierarchy of [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]), a choir of the [[Second Sphere]], along with the [[Dynameis]] ([[Virtues]]) and [[Exousiai]] ([[Powers (Angels)|Powers]]).{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}

[[Zadkiel (Earth-616)|Zadkiel]] was the chief of this order.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 21}}
